patthana24.14:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:1.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:3.1_0: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:3.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:3.1_2: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu ca araṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
